segments.text: I can barely watch as the boy precariously balances on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With every little movement, the stool wobbles dangerously beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching for the cookie jar, his face full of determination and mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I admire his bravery, but it terrifies me to think of the fall he could take.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands there expectantly, her arm outstretched like a little angel waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene feels like it’s teetering on the edge of disaster and delight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would turn around, just once, to see the spectacle unfolding behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
